isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - GENERAL INFORMATION - 1994

svcproc.title: INTRODUCTION
svcproc.para: This service manual section contains information about the electronic engine control systems for the 9600 and 9700 models. This section is designed to complement the service and troubleshooting manuals released by the engine manufacturers. The engine manufacturers manuals include step-by-step instructions for diagnosis and repair.
Chapter I shows how the engine control circuit diagrams are arranged, explains symbols used on the diagrams, and describes how to locate components and connections.
Chapters II through IV contain information needed to assist in troubleshooting the International installed circuits and components included in the subject engine control system.
